short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Doki Doki Literature Club wallpaper turn new tab to Doki Doki Literature Club background. Doki Doki Literature Club theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Enjoy a fresh Doki Doki Literature Club wallpaper with every new tab.
2. Randomize your Doki Doki Literature Club background or save your favorites through the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Utilize the integrated Google search bar.
4. Access your emails and social media accounts with a single click.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. Create new notes to jot down tasks and reminders.
7. Easily reach your most visited websites.
8. Quickly access your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for fast access.
10. One-click access to Google apps.
11. Explore additional themes with ease.
12. Share content quickly on social media.
13. Download wallpapers effortlessly.
14. Instantly play games from your new tab.
15. Enable fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in your Doki Doki Literature Club new tab.
